seo.title: Contact Us - Get in Touch
seo.description: Have questions? Want to talk to a real person? Contact Domain Tescil. No pressure, no sales pitch. Just a real conversation about what you need.

hero.title: Contact Us - Let's Talk
hero.description: No pressure. No sales pitch. Just a real conversation about what you need.

form.title: Send us a message
form.description: Fill out what you can. If you're not sure about something, just leave it blank. We'll figure it out together.

subject.label: What's this about?
subject.placeholder: A quick summary helps us help you faster

message.label: Tell us what's going on
message.placeholder: Don't worry about being technical. Just explain what you're trying to do or what's not working.

form.afterSubmit: After you submit, you'll receive a confirmation email. We'll review your message and respond within an hour during business hours.
form.responseTime: We typically respond within an hour. If it's urgent, mention that in your message and we'll prioritize it.

quickHelp.title: Quick help
quickHelp.description: Looking for something specific? These might get you there faster.

migration.title: Migration help
migration.description: We'll move your site for free

liveChat.title: Prefer live chat?
liveChat.description: The chat widget in the bottom right connects you instantly with a real person.

reassurance.title: We'll guide you through it
reassurance.description: Whether you're stuck on something technical or just exploring your options, we're here to help you figure it out. No judgment, no pressure, no rush. We'll take the time you need.

browseProducts.title: Browse our products
browseProducts.description: Looking for domains, hosting, or SSL certificates?
